description.narrative: IFC is considering an equity investment of up to US$25 million in A91 Emerging Fund I LLP (the Fund). The Fund is targeting US$250-330 million in commitments to invest in ten to fifteen companies in the early growth/ late venture capital stage of development. Target sectors include consumer goods and services, healthcare, financial services and technology.

Project outcome: The Fund manager will provide access to growth capital for investees at an early stage of the companies' development, with ticket sizes of US$5-30 million, primarily to 10-15 small to medium-sized enterprises. IFC expects the value-creation strategies of the Fund Manager will increase investee growth; the Fund manager has an explicit strategy to support 1st-generation entrepreneurs who will bring tech-enabled solutions to disrupt traditional business models, and would target SMEs that have reached an inflexion point and need capital to accelerate growth. The Fund Manager expects to generate high multiples and significantly above average returns. The Fund Manager will transfer knowledge and operational value-add to investees, thanks to an active investment strategy, which will allow investees to increase market, technical, operational and business management competence through sharing the insights of a peer group of entrepreneurs. Contribution to Market Creation: Beyond the project, if successful, this intervention is expected to increase competitiveness by a demonstration effect, through the strengthening of the domestic PE ecosystem, by improving domestic consolidation, by institutionalizing businesses, by growing local companies into national/regional providers and competitors, by encouraging regulatory alignment of the PE ecosystem. Domestic and international business expansion and supply-chains will foster greater integration in the market. Through capacity-building activities, the project will help investee companies expand domestically, promote domestic market integration and stronger supply-chains beyond the direct project outcomes. prior experience with investees The Fund Manager has demonstrated this successfully in.

mailing-address.narrative: 4Point9 Capital Advisors LLP VT Bharadwaj Managing Partner

name.narrative: The Fund is an LLP based in India and will pool funds from domestic and international investors through A91 Partners Fund I (a Mauritius limited company) and A91 Partners Trust (a trust settled under the Indian Trusts Act, 1882). The Fund will focus on equity investments in India.

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
